name: Aivana Health
description: A fully redesigned, modern landing page for Aivana Health, an AI medical simulation platform. This version features a new visual identity, improved UX/UI, and enhanced interactivity to drive user engagement. It includes a sticky navigation, a subtle bio-like particle animation in the hero section, floating medical icons with a parallax effect, a workflow timeline with an EKG pulse animation, and new interactive sections for features (tabs), testimonials (carousel), pricing, and FAQs (accordion). The content is optimized for SEO to attract medical students and professionals.
